item.title: UVI Impact on Growth of Furcifer pardalis Neonates
item.description: We raised two clutches of Furcifer pardalis (Panther Chameleons) under controlled conditions to answer a simple question: How do the growth rates of babies raised under UVI 3 and UVI 6 compare? Background Michael Nash performed a similar experiment which he details in this post.
